name: ë°”ì˜¤ë°¥ë‚˜ë¬´ì»¤í”¼ ê°€ë¡œìˆ˜ê¸¸ì
review:
Possibly my favorite coffee place in Korea. Stumbled upon this gem of a coffee shop because it was cold and we wanted coffee. The vibe is very cozy and the baristas are incredibly friendly. Thereâ€™s a corgi that roams loose in the shop which should already tell you that the place is chill. 

But more than anything, this coffee shop roasts its own beans. It tells you the acidity level of each roast and the origin. If youâ€™re a coffee connoisseur, this place is your place. 

Canâ€™t wait to come back and try the rest of the roasts (also, do yourself a favor and get the cheesecake)

-Din, your friendly neighborhood foreigner
